titles.title: Montgomery GI Bill Flexibility Act of 2005
To amend title 38, United States Code, to extend the time limitation for use of eligibility and entitlement for educational assistance under the Montgomery GI Bill.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.

bill.summary: 5/16/2005--Introduced. Montgomery GI Bill Flexibility Act of 2005 - Extends the period of entitlement to educational assistance under the Montgomery GI Bill to 14 (currently, ten) years after the date of an individual's last discharge or release from active duty.
